text:
Lake View is an unincorporated community in Douglas County, Kansas. It is 1 mile north of Lawrence.
History.
Lake View was created in 1892 as a lake side resort. It was in use until the 1930s. The Lake View club still keeps the oxbow lake.
A post office opened in Lake View (but spelled Lakeview) in 1898. It stayed until 1914.
Lake View was a station on the Atchison, Topeka and Santa Fe Railway.

annotations.surface_form: Atchison, Topeka and Santa Fe Railway
